title: Sacred Root Acupuncture & Naturopathic Medicine
author: Edmin
description: The heart of downtown Edmonds. Featuring the most comprehensive listing of dining, shopping, services and upcoming events.
cleaned_text: Sacred Root Acupuncture & Naturopathic Medicine Health Care [611 Main Street, Suite A Edmonds, WA 98020](https://www.google.com/maps/place/611 Main St, Edmonds, WA 98020) (425) 753 5836 [sacredrootmedicine.com](http://sacredrootmedicine.com) Information Sacred Root Acupuncture & Naturopathic Medicine is a natural healthcare clinic focused on helping individuals and families to find health and sustain everyday wellness using the modalities of Naturopathic and Classical Chinese Medicine. Hours Mon - Fri 9am to 6pm Saturdays by appointment.
